options.description: Specify paths to executable files ("dotnet" by default). [Wildcards](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/wildcards.html?Wildcards) are supported.
Enter [space-separated SDK](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/net.html?net#requiredNetSDK) or targeting pack versions to be required on build agents.
Enter additional command line parameters for [custom command](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/tools/dotnet).
